Subject: Successful Export Events
Body:
Dear Administrator,
The Job extractor to pull data from Ariba to SFTP Server has been successfully executed. Please validate the Destination folder and process accordingly.

- ITK Scheduler

Subject: Unsuccessful Export Events
Body:
Dear Administrator,
The Job extractor from Ariba to SFTP Server failed. Please check the Application logs in BTP Kibana Dashboard.

Thanks,

ITK Scheduler

Subject: Successful Import Events
Body:
Dear Administrator,
The Job extractor to pull data from Ariba to SFTP Server has been successfully executed. Please validate the Destination folder and process accordingly.

- ITK Scheduler

Subject: Unsuccessful Import Events
Body:
Dear Administrator,
The Job extractor from SFTP Server to Ariba failed. Please check the Application logs in BTP Kibana Dashboard.

- ITK Scheduler
